about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a software engineer with professional experience in front-end web development.
about.description2: My primary skill set includes React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and GraphQL. I also have experience with other technologies like Vue and Gatsby JS.
about.description3a: I'm currently working as a front-end software engineer at
about.description4: When I am not coding, I enjoy studying Japanese and have passed the JLPT N2 and Kanji Kentei Level 10 exams.
about.description5: You can reach me at Zach.Stone.Developer@gmail.com
